metadata.synopsis: AD for an empty pod's memory imprint in the Tadpoling Centre, showing a memory from whoever was imprisoned here before.
metadata.how_to_trigger: - Load up GustavDev/SCL_Main_A- Go to the Colony Tadpoling Centre (ReCon command "oe tc_teleport")- Interact with S_COL_TadpolingCentre_MemoryImprint_009_1270e8ed-ca6e-4f0b-a801-b58dcd20c802

0.speaker: Narrator
0.text: *The device does not react to your presence.*
